CustomField.description: By significantly, we mean by over Â£1m or by more than 25% of the total savings (whichever is the greatest). The LCF may still support your project, but we will need a stronger case from your project to warrant this support.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do the savings for your project significantly exceed the total contribution to outcome payments by local commissioners?
CustomField.label: FN - Savings Exceed Contribution
